articles.description: There are surprising results each college football weekend. We just don't know which games. Our experts weigh in with bold predictions for Week 11.
articles.content:
Just four weeks remain in the college football season, and every Saturday the pressure ramps up on teams fighting for spots in the College Football Playoff and conference championship games.

articles.author: Wescott Eberts
articles.title: Texas edge Colton Vasek ruled out against Florida - Burnt Orange Nation
articles.description: Vasek’s change in status was the only alteration to the injury report for the Longhorns on Friday.
articles.content:
The No. 5 Texas Longhorns will be without redshirt freshman edge Colton Vasek on Saturday against the Florida Gators in Austin, according to the Friday injury report from the Longhorns.
